post.body: Sorry if I'm a little late in spotting this, but love the Santa hat! :Take it you're looking forward to xmas? :D
lmao, awwww, you had me all excited! xD
Hahaha, seriously? I haven't been looking hard enough then! Did find a nice little set of terrorists though... xD
Thanks for sharing that link and commenting, glad you liked the article! :)
Sounds like your Christmas is coming a little earlier than the rest of us! :D
Thanks, great to hear the whole review now! I left a comment on your post. Thanks again for the review! :)
Possibly not the kind of app you're looking for, but you won't find a better game than this: http://bit.ly/3DU8j2 :D
I don't think its breathing tbh. Like check out from 3:20 onwards. No sound until 4:05 :(
Loved it (Just sent ya an email now! :D ), but the sound seems to cut out a lot? (Mostly in the 2nd half of the vid)
Have a nice Christmas/New Year then Collis! :D
That was the part that hit me by surprise. It's a shame given how cheap it would be if we were in the US. :(
UK. Didn't realize duty costs would be so high on top of already-expensive shipping. It's my own fault I suppose... :(
I'm not sure, you could email them and ask? Or just signup anyway? It didnt say you had to be full-time I think, so its fine :)
Welcome, hope ya like it! :D
Goood good! :D
Thanks for the retweet! Hope you got yourself an account as well, I cant wait to use it. :D
Freelance Freedom comic this week is fantastic :D http://bit.ly/14ahy
You have to check out the awesome Twitter background on @zoomindesign 's profile! :)
Pro Blog Design reviewed in a screencast by @coreyfreeman -> http://bit.ly/xH0e
5 tshirts from threadless = $55. Cost to post them = $42. Not the value I was hoping for... :(
